function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mandatory mask wearing creating high demand","Impact":"Price gouging, counterfeit versions, theft of stocks","Mitigation":"Regulate prices, crackdown on counterfeit sales, increase security of medical supplies","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, supply chain tracking, price monitoring systems","People":"Consumers, medical professionals, governments","Owner":"Government, law enforcement, medical associations"},{"Description":"Global supply chain vulnerabilities","Impact":"Major shortages in various countries, dependence on a few production centers","Mitigation":"Diversify production locations, increase domestic production, establish emergency stockpiles","Technologies":"Supply chain optimization software, production automation, inventory management systems","People":"Consumers, healthcare providers, governments","Owner":"Manufacturers, governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Rise of counterfeit products","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of protective equipment, potential health hazards","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, stricter regulations, enforcement of quality standards","Technologies":"Product authentication technology, blockchain, quality control systems","People":"Consumers, healthcare providers, governments","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, manufacturers, law enforcement"}]}
